mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendars (main_user_no, sub_user_no, meet_no, address, calendar_dir_x, calendar_dir_y, calendar_datetime, calendar_title, calendar_content) VALUES (#{main_user_no}, #{sub_user_no}, #{meet_no}, #{address}, #{calendar_dir_x}, #{calendar_dir_y}, #{calendar_datetime}, #{calendar_title}, #{calendar_content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM calendars WHERE (main_user_no=#{user_no} OR sub_user_no=#{user_no}) AND calendar_datetime LIKE CONCAT(#{date_num},'%') ORDER BY calendar_datetime
